name: Ink Fish
description:
A VR game using SteamVR and one motion controller, with art direction inspired by traditional Chinese Water-Ink (水墨) style!

Team name: Team InkFish

Team member and email address:

Programmer: Erhan Qu (equ@andrew.cmu.edu), Zhiguo Lai (zhiguol@andrew.cmu.edu), Chenchen Tan (chenchet@andrew.cmu.edu), Chang Liu(cl5@andrew.cmu.edu);

Artist & Sound Designer: Linyao Li (linyaol@andrew.cmu.edu)

Content created before the jam: watershader
